posts.post_content:
Posted By: Leslie Westbrook
Selling a few things to make room for other things. I also have other items for sale in the post-war and memorabilia categories, so check those out if you think you might be interested. Sorry the photos aren't a little better, I had to use a camera instead of a scanner. I'll give discounts for purchases of more than one item. I prefer Paypal, but I'll take a check or M.O. if you'd rather. All prices include shipping. I'll sell the pair for $62 shipped.

1921 Neilson's Chocolate "Deacon" Sam Jones--New York Americans VG-Ex 

$25

[IMG][IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z56/lesliewestbrook/jonesfront.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

[IMG][IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z56/lesliewestbrook/jonesback.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]



1941 Play Ball Joe Cronin misprinted back--Ralston Hemsley upside-down back VG
$45

[IMG][IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z56/lesliewestbrook/croninfront.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
[IMG][IMG]http://i194.photobucket.com/albums/z56/lesliewestbrook/croninback.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
